metaTitle: Cooperation - Major - Dropshipping and Wholesale for Masters
metaDescription: We invite you to join our profitable partnership: craftsmen, beauty salons, and stores. Direct prices from the manufacturer, support, and training. Choose Dropshipping or Wholesale for craftsmen.
cooperationInviteTitle: We invite you to cooperate with us
cooperationInviteParagraph1: hairdressers, beauty salons, hairdressing schools, professional cosmetics stores, and home care beauty markets are invited to participate in a mutually beneficial collaboration:
cooperationInviteListItem1: direct benefits — manufacturer prices, prompt delivery;
cooperationInviteListItem2: support in promoting and training personnel;
cooperationInviteListItem3: regular feedback and updates on new products.
cooperationOfferTitle: We offer the following types of partnerships
cooperationOfferFirstImageAlt: A person works on a laptop and takes notes in a notebook.
cooperationOfferFirstCardListItem1: Minimal initial investment: no need to purchase inventory
cooperationOfferFirstCardListItem2: Wide range of products: You can sell products from different categories without having to store them.
cooperationOfferFirstCardListItem3: Flexibility: You can work from anywhere with internet access.
cooperationOfferCardButton1AriaLabel: Show the second type of partnership
cooperationOfferCardButton2AriaLabel: Show the first type of partnership
cooperationOfferSecondImageAlt: Happy women discuss a new skincare product in elegant packaging. Beauty and health products.
cooperationOfferSecondCardListItem1: Special business prices: optimal order volumes for each format — from training courses to salon chains
cooperationOfferSecondCardListItem2: Flexible logistics: priority order processing, regular deliveries
cooperationOfferSecondCardListItem3: Loyalty program and discounts: cumulative bonuses for volume and early access to new products
cooperationOfferPopUpTitle: Leave your contact details and we will contact you to discuss the terms and conditions.
cooperationOfferPopUpRequestCreated: Thanks! We will be in touch with you soon.
cooperationOfferPopUpErrorRequestCreatio: An error occurred while creating the request. Please try again or try other ways to contact us.
